# 🌱 Basic Functionality

**Keep your plant care timeline in perfect order!**  
The app automatically sorts all your plant entries by date in ascending order, so you always have a clear history trail. Never forget what you did last—your plant's journey is neatly organized! 📅

---

# 💾 Read & Write Files

**Safety first, plant parents!**  
We keep track of your active plant list and even maintain a separate list for deleted or renamed plants—just in case you need to recover something accidentally.  
Plus, there's a handy **Download ⬇️** button in the settings ⚙️ menu so you can export your data as a JSON file. Think of it as your plant-care safety net! 🛡️

---

# 🔔 User Notification

**Your plants won't let you forget!**  
As soon as you add a new plant, the notification system kicks in. You'll get a friendly reminder **2 days before** it's time for fertilizer—so you're always prepared. No more guessing games! 🌿
